snippet.title: ZX Spectrum Longplay [077] Advanced Pinball Simulator
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: MadMatty

Advanced Pinball Simulator on Spectrum 128k

I think I saw this game come out under a variety of names, but on spectrum it was part of the simulator series.

Its abit slow going as I struggle to make the ball go where I want it, but I do complete the adventure in the end. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
